mapper.select: select board_no, notice_no, title, writer, content, notice_date, notice_updatedate, replycnt from (select /*+ INDEX_DESC(board_notice pk_board_notice) */ rownum rn, board_no, notice_no, title, writer, content, notice_date, notice_updatedate, replycnt from board_notice where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and board_no=#{board_no}) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.update: update board_notice set replycnt=replycnt+#{amount} where notice_no=#{notice_no} and board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_notice where notice_no > 0 and board_no=#{board_no}
select * from board_notice where notice_no=#{notice_no} and board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.insert:
select seq_board_notice.nextVal from dual
insert into board_notice(notice_no,title,writer,content,memNo,board_no) values(#{notice_no},#{title},#{writer},#{content},#{memNo},#{board_no})
mapper.update: update board_notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, notice_updatedate=sysdate where notice_no=#{notice_no} and board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.delete: delete from board_notice where notice_no=#{notice_no} and board_no=#{board_no}
